mapper.select: SELECT b.bstate,bt.billname,c.cname,cd.cdlicense,c.cphone,v.vno,b.bid,mb.mbname,rb.rbname,b.Clearingtime,b.Completiontime, a.atime,b.forecastmoney,p.personnelname,pp.personnelname AS pnames,bt.billname ,b.forecastmoney,cd.cdframe,c.cphone AS cphone,cbi.cname AS cartype,a.astate FROM `bills` AS b LEFT JOIN `maintain_bill` AS mb ON b.bid=mb.bid LEFT JOIN `rescue_bill` AS rb ON b.bid=rb.bid LEFT JOIN `carinfo` AS cd ON b.cdlicense=cd.cdlicense LEFT JOIN `personnel` AS p ON b.pno=p.personnelid LEFT JOIN `billstype` AS bt ON b.btid=bt.id LEFT JOIN personnel AS pp ON b.pickcar=pp.personnelid LEFT JOIN `customer` AS c ON cd.cno=c.cno LEFT JOIN `vip` AS v ON c.cno=v.cno LEFT JOIN account AS a ON b.bid=a.bid LEFT JOIN `carbrandinfo` AS cbi ON cd.cdlicense=cbi.cno ORDER BY b.ordertime DESC

SELECT b.bstate,bt.billname,c.cname,cd.cdlicense,c.cphone,v.vno,b.bid,mb.mbname,rb.rbname,b.Clearingtime,b.Completiontime,b.`Ordertime`, a.atime,b.forecastmoney,p.personnelname,pp.personnelname AS pnames,bt.billname ,b.forecastmoney,cd.cdframe,c.cphone AS cphone,cbi.cname AS cartype,a.astate FROM `bills` AS b LEFT JOIN `maintain_bill` AS mb ON b.bid=mb.bid LEFT JOIN `rescue_bill` AS rb ON b.bid=rb.bid LEFT JOIN `carinfo` AS cd ON b.cdlicense=cd.cdlicense LEFT JOIN `personnel` AS p ON b.pno=p.personnelid LEFT JOIN `billstype` AS bt ON b.btid=bt.id LEFT JOIN personnel AS pp ON b.pickcar=pp.personnelid LEFT JOIN `customer` AS c ON cd.cno=c.cno LEFT JOIN `vip` AS v ON c.cno=v.cno LEFT JOIN account AS a ON b.bid=a.bid LEFT JOIN `carbrandinfo` AS cbi ON cd.cdlicense=cbi.cno WHERE b.`bid`=1 AND a.astate=1 AND c.`cno`=1 AND b.`pno`=1
AND b.`Ordertime`> AND b.`Ordertime`<'2020-02-19'
AND b.`btid` =1 AND b.`cdlicense`=1 ORDER BY b.ordertime DESC
mapper.sql: bid, bstate, cdlicense, pno, btid, id, pmid, inid, qualified, reworknum, respeople, Delaysreason, Reworkreason, Expectedtime, Completiontime, Penaltyamount, qmember, Pickcar, Ordertime, Clearingtime, forecastmoney, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bills
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bills (bid, bstate, cdlicense, pno, btid, id, pmid, inid, qualified, reworknum, respeople, Delaysreason, Reworkreason, Expectedtime, Completiontime, Penaltyamount, qmember, Pickcar, Ordertime, Clearingtime, forecastmoney, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5) values (#{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reworknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{respeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delaysreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reworkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{penaltyamount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{qmember,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clearingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{forecastmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bills
bid = #{record.bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bstate = #{record.bstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdlicense = #{record.cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pno = #{record.pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btid = #{record.btid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pmid = #{record.pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inid = #{record.inid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualified = #{record.qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER},

respeople = #{record.respeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Delaysreason = #{record.delaysreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Reworkreason = #{record.reworkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Expectedtime = #{record.expectedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Completiontime = #{record.completiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Penaltyamount = #{record.penaltyamount,jdbcType=REAL},
qmember = #{record.qmember,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pickcar = #{record.pickcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ordertime = #{record.ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Clearingtime = #{record.clearingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

remark4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

bstate = #{bstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},

pno = #{pno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btid = #{btid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

inid = #{inid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualified = #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reworknum = #{reworknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
respeople = #{respeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Delaysreason = #{delaysreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Reworkreason = #{reworkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Expectedtime = #{expectedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Completiontime = #{completiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
